entry.title: WIND WARNING , St. Thomas
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:57 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 4.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: London Int'l Airport 6:00 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 4.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 60 %
Dewpoint: -2.5°C
Wind: NE 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then periods of rain. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Rain at times heavy. High 10.
entry.summary: Periods of rain changing to showers at times heavy near noon. Risk of a thunderstorm late in the morning and in the afternoon. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southwest 60 gusting to 90 in the afternoon. High 10. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 90 diminishing to 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High 6.
entry.summary: Sunny. High 6. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023
